page.title: 02MY DAD'S BUSINESS.
page.content: I think more than anything else I would like to take over my dad's business. He owns a bus company. It is called{RED BUS SERVICES.}He has got 4 buses on the road. He owns 2 Albion Nimbuses. One of them is scrap. The other one is the only Albion Nimbus still in service on Earth! It has got 31 seats. It is red and cream. He owns 3 Bristol L.H. buses. He is in the middle of restoring a very old Bedford bus. I pretend to drive his buses sometimes. I also have a T-key. It is a little instrument all bus drivers have. You put it into a small lock (only on buses) you then twist it to open panels on the bus. I hope I will own the service someday.
